sense.def:
Način, kako dve osebi ali stvari
interact
, je način, kako se sporazumevata ali delata v medsebojnem odnosu.

seg.quote: The tidal currents interacted with the discharge from a river estuary.
Mothers and babies interact in a very complex way.
There is a need for more interaction between staff and children.
...a method of encouraging the interaction of ideas.
